# Sveltest Testing Documentation

> Comprehensive vitest-browser-svelte testing patterns for modern Svelte 5 applications. Real-world examples demonstrating client-server alignment, component testing in actual browsers, SSR validation, and migration from @testing-library/svelte.

## Core Testing Documentation

- **[Getting Started](./getting-started.md)** - Essential setup, configuration, and your first test with vitest-browser-svelte
- **[Testing Patterns](./testing-patterns.md)** - Complete reference for component, SSR, and server testing patterns
- **[Best Practices](./best-practices.md)** - Foundation First approach and Client-Server Alignment Strategy
- **[Migration Guide](./migration-guide.md)** - Step-by-step migration from @testing-library/svelte
- **[API Reference](./api-reference.md)** - Complete reference for all testing utilities and patterns
- **[Troubleshooting](./troubleshooting.md)** - Common errors, solutions, and debugging strategies

## Additional Resources

- **[E2E Testing](./e2e-testing.md)** - End-to-end testing patterns for complete user workflows
- **[CI/CD](./ci-cd.md)** - Production-ready testing pipelines with Playwright containers
- **[About](./about.md)** - Project background, community contributions, and development story

## Available LLM Documentation Formats

- **sveltest-testing-lld.mdc** - Complete low-level documentation with all patterns, examples, and troubleshooting
- **sveltest-testing-rules.mdc** - AI assistant rules for Cursor, Windsurf, and other LLM-powered editors
- **sveltest-testing-patterns.mdc** - Focused pattern library for quick reference and implementation
- **sveltest-testing-migration.mdc** - Dedicated migration guide from @testing-library/svelte
- **sveltest-testing-troubleshooting.mdc** - Comprehensive error resolution and debugging guide

---

*For the latest examples and to contribute, visit the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/spences10/sveltest)*
